projects:
[{'title': 'Treasure Recovery Expedition – Former DDR', 'date': {'start': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}, 'end': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}}, 'description': 'Treasure Recovery Expedition – Former DDR
Historical Research and Recovery
June 2015

Being seriously intrigued by a television series on National Geographic Channel concerning historic treasure hunting in former East Germany, there remained only one persistent question: what if…?

What if.. you’re fortunately to know a couple of dozen very experienced hands-on hydrographers, geophysicists, nautical archaeologists, skippers, data processors, project managers and event coordinators..
What if.. you’re able do a thorough historical desktop study about the particular location..
What if.. you manage to resource high end, state-of-the-art hydrographical end geophysical survey equipment..
What if.. you can arrange several professional survey vessels..

What if.. you can combine all of the above and prepare an expedition..


June 2015
After weeks of preparations, on a randomly selected Friday at midnight in June 2015, several fueled-up 4x4’s, pick-up trucks, vans and some slightly outdated vehicles, equipped with no less than three trailerable vessels fully prepared and mobilized with Multibeam Echo sounders, SideScanSonar, Sub-bottom-profiler equipment and cesium-vapor marine magnetometers, diving equipment along with a serious amount of data processing computers, head for a secret location about 100 km North of Berlin.. You do the math. 

Within 3 days, over 3 million square meters were surveyed ánd processed into highly detailed charts and graphs, revealing some extraordinary claims, which can’t be denied.. A professional documentary team joined the project and filmed the adventures of this ones-in-a-lifetime expedition. 
More details and documentary will be disposable upon request.

The primary objective was to bring both strengths and qualities of both JV partners together to a higher level, where opportunities arise that both companies by itself could not achieve. Apart from increasing opportunities and developments for the best of the JV, it was always important to safeguard the interests of both partners.

DOBstar, LLC, registered in California (USA), has been launched and, after extensive testing and modifying prototypes, preparing and executing a marketing plan, the systems are manufactured and put into the market.

DOBstar, LLC also provides additional services such as arranging demonstrations, evaluation test, training and support, worldwide.

In summary, my main tasks:

- Achieving the joint venture to be designed and registered
- Supporting the launch of products and services offered
- 'Bridging' between both JV partners, as well as between customers and technicians
- Applying structure within the JV
- Develop and implement (online) data / information tools to collaborate efficiently between both partners / locations
- Commercial conduct policy and monitoring
- Organizing exhibitions / trade shows, such as WindForce Bremen, WindEnergy Hamburg
- Relationship management, both internally and externally
- Creating expansion of client database / potential customers or end-users
- Planning and monitoring of projects and development programs
- Alignment of available capacity and resources", 'title': 'Business Development Manager', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 2289836, 'name': 'Forteiland Pampus', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/D4E0BAQF8qdZBL7Qgpw/company-logo_400_400/0/1681389628196?e=1700092800&v=beta&t=HNwUuue5OnO4_JWxMg5FIAvjCB9cdS91iHDRt-WVd94', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/forteiland-pampus/', 'employees': {'start': 51, 'end': 200}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2008}, 'end': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Muiden, The Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2008}, 'end': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}}, 'company': 'Forteiland Pampus', 'description': "Forteiland Pampus is a small man made island, more than 100 years old with a historical fort and situated in the Markermeer near Amsterdam and Muiden. The fort is a monument, the island an adventurous place which can only be reached by boat. 
Forteiland Pampus is part of 'De Stelling of Amsterdam' (Amsterdam Defense Line) and listed as world heritage by UNESCO. Pampus is owned by a private foundation and is financially depending on visitors, sponsoring and gifts. Every season about 40.000 guests visit the island.

As a Fortwachter / Island Manager I was part of the management team, dealing with all-round responsibilities:
- Obviously, as the Island can only be reached by boats; logistics of crew, personnel, guests and supplies is a major challenge, every day
- With no strings or lifelines to shore, all the facilities needed to be up-and-running at all times, including multiple generator-sets, water pumps, sewerage, solar panels, boats, etc. Maintaining all the facilities, buildings and vessels was a day-to-day job
- Recruiting and coordinating volunteers and employees
- Apart from actually residing on the island, hosting / informing visitors was present at all times
- Developing and realization of a bar / restaurant
- Supporting the realization of a high-tech multimedia centre
- the daily operation of the island (with interactive museum inside the fort, and bar/restaurant) 
- Developing en organizing events, both business and public", 'title': 'Coördinerend Fortwachter (Island Manager)', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Seabed bv', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2007}, 'end': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2008}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Amsterdam Area, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2007}, 'end': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2008}}, 'company': 'Seabed bv', 'description': ".
Being 'one of the three'...


Seabed BV

Founded in 2004, Seabed started off with three employees and a range of approximately twenty products. Over the years, the company has evolved into a full-grown company that employs 9 professionals and offers a broader range of products.
From the early start, the representation of several companies combined with Seabed’s technical know-how proved to be of major importance. That forms the key to its success.

Seabed philosophy

Seabed aims to create the perfect balance between sales, support and engineering.
The company offers a combination of technical knowledge, practical experience and a broad sales network to support its clients. Its team consists of young professionals with a variety of educational and specialist backgrounds. Their combined expertise contributes to Seabed’s high-quality product development, support and engineering.", 'title': 'Commercial Engineer', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': "Hook's Diving", 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2006}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2007}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Curacao, Netherlands Antilles', 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2006}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2007}}, 'company': "Hook's Diving", 'description': 'Working at the one of the best dive shops in Curacao, besides being a dive instructor and dive guide, together with colleagues I was responsible of all kinds of activities: sales, planning, events, sailing and maintenance of dive equipment and compressors', 'title': 'Scuba Dive Instructor', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Seabed bv', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2004}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2006}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Amsterdam Area, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2004}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2006}}, 'company': 'Seabed bv', 'description': ".
